overview: A young couple moves into what appears to be the perfect home, but when they discover that they will soon become parents, things begin to fall apart. Rachel, the expectant mother, is haunted by a ghost in a red dress, while Kevin, the soon to be father, has frightening nightmares even while heâ€™s awake. The once happy couple is torn apart by horrific events, which all seem to be centered around the birth of their unborn child.
title: 2 Bedroom 1 Bath
